caption: This song contains a string section playing a soft rising melody with key changes then an upright bass comes in being played with a bow and long strokes. An acoustic piano panned to the right side of the speakers is playing a melody along to the female voice singing. This song may be playing in a dramatic scene of a Disney movie.
